title: 5 Best double door refrigerators of 2024 to upgrade your household
summary: Your modern kitchen demands a refrigerator that is not only modern but the one that promises you long lasting companionship, with outstanding shelf life, upgraded efficiency and advanced features. Among all the products, the ones mentioned here in this article were chosen carefully just to cater to all your diverse preferences and needs, to make sure you make a purchase you are satisfied and happy with your latest purchase.

1.title: Samsung 322 L, 3 Star, Convertible 5-in-1 Digital Inverter with Display Frost Free Double Door Refrigerator (RT37C4523B1/HL, Black Matt, 2024 Model)
1.summary:
Key Features:

  • Frost Free Refrigerator: Auto Defrost with powerful cooling and long lasting freshness and performance. Manage your flexible storage needs with different convertible modes : |Normal Mode|Extra Fridge Mode|Seasonal Mode|Vacation Mode|Home Alone Mode
  • Capacity 322 liters: Suitable for families with 3 to 4 members
  • Energy Rating : 3 Star Energy Efficiency
  • Manufacturer Warranty : The product comes with a 1 year comprehensive warranty and a 20 years warranty on the digital inverter compressor
  • Digital Inverter Compressor provides greater energy efficiency, less noise and long-lasting performance while consuming 50% less power, backed up by 20 year warranty
  • Interior Description : Fresh Food Capacity : 250 Ltr | Freezer Capacity : 72 Ltr | Total no. of compartments : 2 | Shelves : 3 | Vegetable Drawers : 1 | Shelf Type : Toughened Glass Shelves | Anti Bacterial Gasket |
  • Special Features : Twin Cooling Plus | Convertible 5-in-1 | Digital Display | Power Freeze | Power Cool | Coolpack | Deodorizer
  • Additional Features : Stabilizer Free Operation (100v - 300v) | Multi Flow | Up to 15 Days of Fresh Food | Recess Handle | Door Alarm | Easy Clean Back | Veg Box | Big Bottle Guard (Deep Door Guard) | LED Light
  • Item Dimensions : (WxHxD)(mm): 60x171.5x67.2 cm | Net Weight 59 kg
  • Included in the box : 1 Refrigerator unit, User Manual, Warranty Card, Egg Tray, Movable Ice Maker
